full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019B (RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA NI, BKRA SHIS CHOS 'KHOR GLING GRVA TSANG GI GRVA BA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG MKHAS GRUB AU'I CING NANG SO LA, RNAM THOS SRAS LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL GYI DPE CHA LA BRNYED PAR KHYED BDE ZHIG BSGRIGS @020A *, ,ZER PO'I NGO BSRUNG PHYIR RNAM DAG YIS GE KHOL LO CHOS RJES THA SHAL BLO BZANG SKAL BZANG BDAG GIS CHOS SKYONG RNAMS KYIS GSHEGS GTOR LA DBE LENGS TE BSGRIGS PA LA, LHA DANG YE SHES SPYAN DRANGS LDAN MKHAS PA'I TSOGS KYI BZANG POR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,'BRAL DU BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI SHE TA TA PI LIG THUNG BU MDZAD BLO BZANG RIG GROL LO, ,DES KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
